tns:patch.author: nmandrescu
tns:patch.description: Update old patches location for dev servers where patches already executed

script.lang: UPDATE amp_xml_patch SET location='xmlpatches/2.8.11/' WHERE patch_id IN ('AMP-17564-adding-indexes.xml', 'AMP-17564-drop-amp-activity-expanded-table.xml', 'AMP-17564-enable-recreate-views.xml');
